#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
    ll k,i,j,n,lo,hi,t[1005];
    lo=1;hi=10e15;cin>>k>>n;
    for(i=0;i<k;i++) cin>>t[i];
    while(lo<hi)
    {
        ll sum=0;
        ll mid=(lo+hi)/2;
        for(i=0;i<k;i++)
        sum+=mid/t[i];
        if(sum>=n) hi=mid;
        else lo=mid+1;
    }
    cout<<lo<<endl;
    return 0;
}
